LanguageData.ArachnaeSwarm.RaidWaveDef.ARA_Wave_Scout: A small squad with higher movement speed.
LanguageData.ArachnaeSwarm.RaidWaveDef.ARA_Wave_Assau: A raid team mainly composed of assault-type swarmites, with poor resistance to melee damage.
LanguageData.ArachnaeSwarm.RaidWaveDef.ARA_Wave_Acid_: A large number of swarmites with acid sacs. Their weapons can spray strong acid.
LanguageData.ArachnaeSwarm.RaidWaveDef.ARA_Wave_Heavy: Fully armed swarmites with high durability.
LanguageData.ArachnaeSwarm.RaidWaveDef.ARA_Wave_Mixed: A mixed force with balanced composition, including various unit types.
